title: I realized why trolls arent banned
body:
People don't report them.

Plain and simple.

They instead honor them for the "free wins"

replies.body: Yeeeeeah, this is one of the problems. They whine about reporting trolls on their team, but then they will either not report when it is the opponent, BM and say "Only if you surrender." or just don't care because "Oh well, not me."
The trolls, afk's, and flamers arent the ones who make the community shit, it is those who enable them.

i always report leavers regardless of team, as for trolls sometimes its hard to tell when they are on the other team whether or not they are really trolling, but when it is clear enough that they are trolling and not just really bad at league i will report them...even if it is freelo, because i dont want them on my team the next game :P

Exactly, you can't always tell what's really going on in terms of toxicity, etc. after a game... 

I just a had a game where the other team asked me if annie was trolling since "she just ran into us"  

Usually it's a he said, she said type of thing. 

It would be nice if chat logs could be reviewed in the post game lobby.
Trolls just make a new account when they get banned. They never leave, they just change their mask.
